name: Rei Taro
profile_summary: Dynamic Senior Python Backend Engineer with over 10 years of experience in developing high-quality backend systems, focusing on financial platforms and cloud-native solutions. Proficient in **Python** (including **Django**) and familiar with multiple frameworks such as **Go**, **Node.js**, **GraphQL**, and **gRPC**. Skilled in orchestrating automated workflows using **CI/CD** practices and tools including **Docker** and **Kubernetes**. Strong experience with cloud infrastructure service providers like **AWS**, utilizing infrastructure as code tools such as **Terraform**, **CDK**, and **CloudFormation**. Capable of working with various data storage solutions, including **Relational databases** and **Schema-less databases**. Committed to creating high-performing APIs and scalable services, with a proven ability to deliver impactful projects at industry leaders like VISA, Sii Poland, and Reply Polska.
